text.title: Woman fined in Spain under new 'Gag Law'
text.head: Woman fined in Spain under new 'Gag Law'
Sources

list.item: Stephen Burgen. "Spanish woman fined for posting picture of police parked in disabled bay" — The Guardian , August 16, 2015
Chris Matyszczyk. "Woman fined for Facebook pic of police car in disabled spot" — CNET , August 16, 2015
"Primera aplicación de la “Ley Mordaza” en Petrer y primera gran polémica" — petreraldia.com , August 11, 2015 «[ create es language template]»
